page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN STOURPORT
page.content: We are lucky in this time of unemployment that only 4% of those people questioned were{unemployed (parents of 7-9 year old children). 12% were{self employed. 90% stated they enjoyed their work 40% travelled between 1 and 5 miles to get to work,1 person travelled a thousand miles per week. Most people travel to work by car. Workers received between 5 and 7 weeks {paid holiday}per year. Mothers do not work so much as they look after the homes. 40% do not work at all. 36% work part-time. The remainder are in full employment.
